name: Extended-release quetiapine
title: Prescribing of extended-release quetiapine
as a percentage of prescribing of all quetiapine
description: as a percentage of prescribing of all quetiapine.
why_it_matters: There is a huge difference in cost between immediate and extended release preparations of quetiapine.
The extended release preparations should ideally be reserved for patients who cannot tolerate the IR version
or for whom compliance may be an issue.
numerator_where: (bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AV' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AW' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AX'
OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AY' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%BA' )
denominator_where: (bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AB' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AC' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AD'
OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AF' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AK' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AV'
OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AW' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AX' OR bnf_code LIKE '0402010AB%AY'
